project.description:
Adds a dummy user account for testing into LDAP. Makes sure that the dummy account has every relevant field which is required later on by the shibboleth attribute-releas.xml (uid,cn,mail)
Accepted options:
LDAP_ADMIN_PW (optional) changeit LDAP_BIND_DN (optional) cn=Manager,dc=my-domain,dc=com DUMMY_PASSWORD (optional) dummy DUMMY_USERNAME (optional) dummy

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
DUMMY_PASSWORD=${DUMMY_PASSWORD:-dummy} DUMMY_USERNAME=${DUMMY_USERNAME:-dummy} LDAP_ADMIN_PW=${LDAP_ADMIN_PW:-changeit} LDAP_BIND_DN=${LDAP_BIND_DN:-cn=Manager,dc=my-domain,dc=com}
DUMMY_PASSWORD_HASH=`slappasswd -s ${DUMMY_PASSWORD}`
cat > dummy.ldif <<EOF dn: dc=my-domain,dc=com dc: my-domain objectClass: top objectClass: domain
dn: ou=people,dc=my-domain,dc=com objectClass: organizationalUnit ou: people
dn: ou=computereng,dc=my-domain,dc=com objectclass: organizationalunit ou: computereng
dn: uid=${DUMMY_USERNAME},ou=people,dc=my-domain,dc=com objectClass: inetOrgPerson objectClass: eduperson userpassword: ${DUMMY_PASSWORD_HASH} cn: Dummy Dummyson uid: ${DUMMY_USERNAME} sn: Dummyson mail: dummy@my-domain.com eduPersonOrgUnitDN: ou=computereng,dc=my-domain,dc=com eduPersonOrgUnitDN: ou=people,dc=my-domain,dc=com eduPersonPrimaryOrgUnitDN: ou=people,dc=my-domain,dc=com EOF
ldapadd -x -w ${LDAP_ADMIN_PW} -D "${LDAP_BIND_DN}" -f dummy.ldif || if [ $? -ne 68 ]; then exit 1; fi
